Title: TELUGU Tap and Listen
Instructions: Student need to listen to file and learn
Textarea: Hello, Children! Do you know my name? Have you ever seen me? I am a train. My name is Rail Raja. I am your friend. I have many wheels. I run on rails. I have an engine on my face. I have bogies as my body. My tail is the guard’s room. I am very long. I make the sound Coo… Coo … Chuk… Chuk… I go to various places
